title: Perma ban scripters.
body: 3rd party programmers should be PERMANENTLY banned even if it's first time offence. over the past couple days i've counted 6 scripters and they never seem to be punished, but people who say EZ at the end of a game get a 14 day suspension. What. A. Joke.

replies.body: All scripters get perma banned though riot bans in waves, so people who used a script could be banned as much as a year later.

^ This

3rd party bans are permanent after first time offence, but aren't administered through the instant feedback system and are rather put through in waves. Everyone from scripters to people that purchased bot accounts will be banned although it may take longer than usual. 
The most likely reason for this is because 3rd part bans are pretty serious (instant perma) and Riot wants to make extra sure that they aren't banning innocent people.

The answer lies within your comment my friend.

People who script are contributing their time and talent to making the game more of a challenge for you. Should we not applaud them?

People who spam EZ are just showing that the game is not challenging enough. We don't need this kind of complacency and disrespect from those that don't contribute! I SAY BAN. BAN THEM ALL.

Honour this man!

But on a serious note regarding the original post.
I actually disagree. I believe everyone deserves a chance even scripters. Not that I condone that sort of thing whatsoever, but in reality scripters are bringing you less grief than those who abuse you, and call out EZ at the end of the game. They actually want to win, yeah they are cheating, yeah they should be punished... but permanently banning someone for that? How about a no end of year rewards etc.? Hell Bill Gates cheated his whole empire... Just a thought.

On a quick side note though, I think that "botters", those who are using scripts purely to to level and gain IP should be permanently banned. That's just money making bullcrap.
